website_summaries.verdict: A practical chest freezer that will likely fit your budget, this one has both interior space and features that make it a solid value.
pros: Offers a compact yet spacious design that is practical for many consumers
Wire basket helps with organizing contents
cons: Has the tendency to build up frost

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: My husband would rate ZERO stars if he could. Had freezer one week and it stopped working. We lost all the food we had in it. Called company and was told we voided the warranty because we had it in the garage. SERIOUSLY. One week? There was nothing in the paperwork or warranty information about not using it in a garage. The paperwork claims they pride themselves on customer service, but that's not true. Fortunately Amazon stands behind what it sells and we were able to return to them. Amazon's customer service is excellent every time we use them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Judie

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! I Read Every review
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! I Read Every review... Good and Bad. Decided to buy. This freezer is of a quality that I have not seen in my 65 years. Excellent quality. Delivered by UPS, (amazing for its large size and weight), the freezer arrived in perfect shape. Excellent packaging. EASY to set up. I immediately placed 3 thermometers inside and plugged it in. 2 hours later, the temp was -12 degrees. Set thermostat to warmest setting and my thermometers registered lower than 10 degrees after 6 hours. So, this thermostat is not good for refrigeration temperatures, Not to worry, there are many easy ways around this if you might someday need a refrigerator instead of a freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but no interior light.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter and son-in-law. I managed to unbox it and hook it up by myself! And I'm OLD! Excellent product. Only giving 4 stars because I expected it to have an interior light. It never occurred to me that a frost free, energy efficient freezer this size would come without a light.
customer_reviews.author: Lady2

customer_reviews.title: Nice bigger, small freezer.
customer_reviews.text: We decided to buy this one because it was on the bigger side of the front door style, small freezers (as opposed to a chest freezer). The freezer looks solidly and cleanly made. Shelves have cooling coils integrated which prevents you from adjusting shelves, but most items should fit fine (approximately 7.5" inches of height in top and middle shelves, 10" in bottom section). Top of freezer is textured and looks to be a good place to store kitchen items on top.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after one month
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Amazon review I have ever written. I have had this freezer for a month and the door has dropped and is loose. The plastic seal around the door frame detached and is constantly coming loose regardless of how many times I stuff it back in. This means that the freezer is not as cold as it should be because of the faulty seal. I will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: baxterrocks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 1 bedroom apartment
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 1 bedroom apartment, Its in my living room, looks very nice, makes no noise and freezes real cold yet has a real great adjustable temperature gauge if you don't like real super frozen, the basket inside is nice and slides from one side to the other very effortlessly. Its very cool in every way. Update (7-10-2018) Still love my freezer and it still loves me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: I suspect all the people that have had issues plugged ...
customer_reviews.text: I suspect all the people that have had issues plugged this thing in right away without letting it stand upright for the full 6 hours. Also you have to be sure to keep things away from the sensor at the very top back right or the sensor frosts and the rest of the unit gets warm.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: New freezer
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Works.like a dream, just the perfect size for a single person. The delivery was swift and left right at the front door. I was able to move it inside by myself (for which I was truly grateful). It holds more than I thought it would, and still room for more. I will treasure this appliance for a very Long time.
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Clawson

customer_reviews.title: Buy the extended warranty, we needed it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these units in May 2017 and the first one came in freight damaged. Amazon replaced it a week later and that unit arrived in great shape. The unit shot craps in September 2018, luckily I bought the 5 year extended warranty and got a purchase price refund. Local trusted appliance repairmen told me since the compressor was running it maybe low on the refrigerant which wasn't available. When it worked it worked great. Since these don't have a temperature alarm I suggest you buy a wireless unit such as Acu Rite Digital Refer/Freezer Thermometer to monitor the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Flint Mc

customer_reviews.title: Don’t call for warranty support...you wont get through.
customer_reviews.text: So I highly recommend staying away from this product. After 7 months the compressor stopped (or so I believe), and I lost 150 lbs of meat. I called support as this item is still under its 1 year warranty and was answered by the automated system that said if I left a message I would be called back within 30 minutes and wouldn’t lose my place in line. That was last week, so I am guessing I was really far behind in the queue. On the upside, there are other competitors that might stand by their products, or at least answer the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket Williams

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT - LOUSY FREEZER - Just feeling stuck.
customer_reviews.text: The return window closed April 27, this Freezer is broken and all the food is ruined. It just slowly quit cooling/freezing.It worked for just under 90 days. Melted ice cream was all over the bottom of the freezer. The Manufacturer guarantees this product for only 30 days. I cannot find any phone numbers to contact Amazon to return or get refund on this. Like someone else said, Money just wasted. $200.00 !?? The only way to find a phone number for Amazon is to buy a book??? This is so frustrating and disappointing. I will certainly not buy anything this expensive on Amazon again. RATS!!! Of course, this is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect from ordering to filling it up!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my new freezer! The delivery process went very well. It was threshold delivery, inside your door but the guy was kind enough to take it on into the kitchen for me. Not a scratch or dent was found. Very easy to get out of the packaging, very easy to level and set up. Perfect process all the way! It's now almost full of yummies! The freezer over the refrigerator just wasn't cutting it! I can now cook all sorts of goodies and not have to worry about throwing excess away. Loving my new freezer!
customer_reviews.author: J Thomas

customer_reviews.title: very cheep
customer_reviews.text: This freezer is very poor quality we have had nothing but problems with it we have to defrost it every couple of weeks and now it quit and will not restart now so we have to buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Get Cold - Waste of Time and Money
customer_reviews.text: Never turned cold. Just slightly cool. Put food in and it melted. Real pain in returning it too. Very unhappy. Save yourself the trouble and don't buy a Danby.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: 0 star
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this freezer; it never worked. Upon plugging it in, it gave a terrible smell, but it never actually worked. It is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Kati in ATL

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fives we have had this in our garage with no problems. We live in Texas and the temp can get up there, freezer is handling it with no issues yet. Since its only tow of us the size is perfect, we had a cheap chest style from Home Depot that stopped working after 11 months. If this one keeps on working after a year I will up it to five stars. A stand up freezer is much easier to see what you have inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jrk65

customer_reviews.title: Unit not conducive to being shipped
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box, followed directions, placed it in my temp controlled basement and the unit failed. In fact it stayed on for about an hour (max) and then all of my food began melting. Amazon was great in the return process. This product states that shipping might cause it damage....It did. It could be a good product. It was not for me. I now have to find a way to dispose of it. Called Danby's customer service and they were worthless. Their question was.....Does your outlet work and find a new one? Seriously? Amazon was great
customer_reviews.author: agnes01

customer_reviews.title: Works great, virtually slient. A smart investment.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about 7 months ago and it's working perfectly in my garage. My kitchen's refrigerator is the conventional kind with a small freezer at the top. The new chest freezer accommodates large quantities of Costco frozen items, and it's a pleasure to not have the small kitchen freezer stuffed to its edges with food. So glad I purchased the Danby freezer! UPDATE to the review. The freezer stopped working in August, 2019. I did by the Assurant warranty on it, and received an Amazon credit of $295 from Assurant. So, I can't recommend this freezer.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal guy

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with delivery service
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with delivery service. All the reviews I read indicated the personnel would unpack the freezer in place. This was not done and refused by the men. We are senior citizens and this task of unpacking was horrendous. Will always check other online buying services in the future for more accurate reviews and information. Luckily we do not see any damage so far, the unit is powered up and will advise further if anything additional develops.
customer_reviews.author: roberta davis

customer_reviews.title: The Right Choice
customer_reviews.text: I am completely happy with this freezer. It arrived on time and was contained in a double strong carton with appropriate styrofoam padding. It was undamaged and even has casters installed for easy moving. It is well worth more than the cost. I highly recommend this freezer as a "best buy"
customer_reviews.author: David E Branch

customer_reviews.title: Works, but stinks.
customer_reviews.text: Freezes well, but has strong scent of oil from the compressor. Scent gets into food.
customer_reviews.author: c.kernaghan

customer_reviews.title: Great little freezer
customer_reviews.text: This freezer is 100% silent and works like a champ. I keep it on my covered patio. The documentation that comes with this freezer states that it is only meant for in door use. So, I know if it craps out it is probably because it is not inside. But so far so good. The size is perfect for us and it keeps everything frozen solid.
customer_reviews.author: luvbub

customer_reviews.title: Be VERY Careful Buying This From Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 but because dimensions were slightly off could only fit 1 - when contacted Amazon about return they refused to help and said to contact manufacturer - Danby told me that all returns must go through Amazon - understand that if you purchase this through Amazon it is essentially non returnable since neither Amazon or Danby will facilitate a return
customer_reviews.author: robert d. english

customer_reviews.title: No un-crating and no returns available!
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace in 3 days. Filled up with frost immediately. Defrosted, completely dried interior and fan dried. Filled up again within a day with frost. Amazon did send a replacement freezer, but now I have a defective freezer sitting my foyer because Amazon would not take the defective one away. I am 74 and handicapped. Sure hope the replacement freezer does not frost up. No room for a third freezer . . .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work out of the box. Amazon tried to contact the manufacturer to "troubleshoot" to no avail. Then offered me 98 dollars credit... I paid over 300... after an hour and a half on the phone with amazon... got a return label and pickup at the house... Cool. Item was returned... Amazon sent an automated email saying the tech that helped me said the item was sent on accident, not broken.... was told I would not be getting a refund. 2 hour long phone calls after got me my refund but I will NEVER buy a danby item again
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E.

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for perfect for all places
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small apartment, dorm rooms, man/women caves. We love extra freezer space for popsicles, treats, extra ice. Runs quiet light weight, one basket, easy defrost. If you rent you know that refrigerators in apartments have tiny freezers no ice makers. This freezer makes it so much better and when not needed someone always wants it, but don't give it up I always have to get another because it is so perfect.. Good Price no shipping on prime.
customer_reviews.author: Allice Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect freezer for a family of 4
customer_reviews.text: Compact, yet very roomy. Love the basket for smaller items. Keeps everything frozen solid. Very quiet. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: dixiedreg

customer_reviews.title: Just the right side for extra freezer space for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Just the right side for extra freezer space for my husband and me. We didn't need a huge freezer, this is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Danby  3.8 cu. ft. Freezer
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving 3 Stars based on initial impressions out of the box. Ordinarily I would send this back, but as I needed it 2 days ago I can’t. Right out of the box there is a large dent on the front, and a smaller one on the corner. Also, the left leveling leg is damaged, but sort of adjustable ( enough to level ). I just need this to work. I will eventually modify my review after some use.
customer_reviews.author: B in da Bronx

customer_reviews.title: Quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Had this about 3 years, no problems at all. Does get a bit of frost build up but not bad. It's a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Mel R.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Freezer
customer_reviews.text: A great freezer! Contains a pull out basket and leveling feet. It seems to run very efficiently. I wish I had gotten it sooner. The free shipping and delivery right to my door, solved many problems for me.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Heath

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Freezer came and never would freeze! All amazon could offer was a refund for the freezer to my card (which is going to take 3-5 business days) or on a Amazon gift card (as if I want to buy it again) and Danby is only telling me they can only MAKE ME MAKE AN APPOINTMENT with an appliance store so they can come out to my home to troubleshoot it and THEN if need be, they will replace it but that can take up to 30 days! Completely inconvienced, especially the holidays so food is going to spoil. I’ll never buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: DeJanea K.

customer_reviews.title: The freezer works great, is very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Energy efficient with a clean-looking design! I use this to store a surplus of frozen breastmilk. Once I wean my little one, it will be used to store frozen food. The freezer works great, is very quiet, and does not run up our energy bill. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: LKH

customer_reviews.title: On the normal recommended setting, my fish stayed at about 15-20 degrees ...
customer_reviews.text: A convenient deep freezer. It fits lots of food, but stays out of the way....and you can use it as a table. It's quiet and works well. On the normal recommended setting, my fish stayed at about 15-20 degrees before freezing. Speaking of fish, it stores about 100 lbs of vacuumed packed tuna. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and matches our Danby refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and matches our Danby refrigerator. This was an open-box item and unfortunately, the previous purchaser used a long blade to open the carton and sliced the gasket. It still works well and cools sufficiently. I purchased a new gasket form Danby. Things like this can happen with open-box items.
customer_reviews.author: phlip

customer_reviews.title: Very nice freezer
customer_reviews.text: Reluctant 5stars Would be perfect with light Defrost and thermometer But is quiet and evenly cold
customer_reviews.author: Allen P

customer_reviews.title: Great freezer that fits in an apartment
customer_reviews.text: I love this little freezer. The coils are in the shelves, so they can't be adjusted, but there's plenty of room to fit what I need. As a grad student, I rarely have time to cook, so this freezer let's me stockpile homemade meals along with frozen prepared meals. Its size allows it to fit in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: plugged in,,,did not work,,,yes i tried that,,,that to,,,,,,its junk!,,,,4 TIMES i have tryed to contact amazon,,,,NO REPLY,,,,,SELLER SAYS,,,,CONTACT AMAZON,,,,,AMAZON WILL NOT REPLY,,,,,W.T.F.??????? LITTLE HELP FROM SELLER & NONE FROM AMAZON,,,,,429.00$$$$ i totaly understand with the caronavirus & all,,,,but comeonnnnn,,,,,,,,,iam out 429.00$$$$$!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived well packaged and a day ahead of time. After allowing it to sit, as required, I started it up the next day and it worked like a charm and cooled very quickly. The packaging protected the item very well as the exterior packaging was very roughed up, but the inner packaging was very clean and the product arrived into the kitchen like off the show room floor. No problems!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little freezer
customer_reviews.text: Great little freezer, except it has a tendency to ice up around the top. I took another reviewers advice and put rolls of heavy duty wire that I had laying around on each corner, which seems to help. I just knock off the ice if it builds up as opposed to defrosting it.
customer_reviews.author: Tequila Sue

customer_reviews.title: I think Danby is a better brand with better customer support than Haier
customer_reviews.text: We had a five-year old upright small freezer that quit due to compressor failure. Haier does not have repair parts so we could not repair it. This Danby unit is the right size for our garage application and is working well for us after two months use. I think Danby is a better brand with better customer support than Haier.
customer_reviews.author: D. T. Berns

customer_reviews.title: Might have to sell it they won't take it back
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a couple weeks smells like a dead rat died all around the unit. The corner was damaged, obviously this was a returned item and resold. Still more dead rat smell. Looks nice but I could have gotten a 5.0 cubic unit for a lot less, but this was "Amazon's Choice" ROFL. I'll probably have to pay someone just to get rid of it now.
customer_reviews.author: spartca

customer_reviews.title: Good freezer!
customer_reviews.text: Silent runing. Low energy consumption. Allows me to purchase food on sale saving me the Cost of product on my first day of ownership . Too small for a family but perfect if you're single or a couple.
customer_reviews.author: tallguy

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 4 years. Lost more food than the freezer was worth.
customer_reviews.text: I will never, ever, ever buy another product from Danby. When I needed it most, it died, and I lost all the food I had in it. You'd think a freezer would last more than just a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Freezer
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and has a temperature control. Easy to move and freezes our product. Happy buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Mgus

customer_reviews.title: This is just what I needed for my pantry/laundry room ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for my pantry/laundry room. I stacked my washer and dryer and placed this where the dryer used to be. Because it is not very deep it was able to fit without having to relocate the dryer vent in the floor. It seems to be working very well and hold lots of food.
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: We are so impressed with this little freezer. We were looking for an upright freezer but we didn’t want something that took up a lot of space. This freezer fit the bill. It fits perfect in our laundry room and you really don’t notice it. It has a sleep the parents and the best feature is it when you close the door there’s a vacuum suction to pull the door tight.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine-- but it's dented!
customer_reviews.text: This freezer came this morning, I plugged it in and it seems to work fine. But it came with small dents on both rear edges-- and a mysterious, extra broken piece inside. I'm not going to return it for a few dents, but still it's less than I'd expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Abrams

customer_reviews.title: So far--it's a great freezer.
customer_reviews.text: The shipping box looked like it had been rolled down a flight of stairs, but the inner box and freezer were fine. I leveled the unit with a 'level' and waited about 12 hours before plugging it in. It got very cold quite quickly. So far, so good. Only time will tell how well it's made. But at present, I really do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Loodis

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what we needed to fit into a tight spot! We're happy with the functioning, with the available space (especially that it DOES have door shelves), and how quiet it is!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and holds the temp well.
customer_reviews.text: This was bigger than I expected. Shipped with no damage to the box or freezer. It was easy for my 21 year old grandson to move and set up in the spacious bedroom of my galley kitchen apartment. Took no time at all to chill so I could add frozen foods.
customer_reviews.author: dylans_busha

customer_reviews.title: packed good, so far works great
customer_reviews.text: on time, packed good, so far works great, stays dead on zero
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Working so far for 3 months without issue. Using ...
customer_reviews.text: Working so far for 3 months without issue. Using it as a fermentation chamber with a added temperature controler. You can fit a 6-Gallon upright bucket on the bottom of this freezer.
customer_reviews.author: SGARFIELD16

customer_reviews.title: Very fast shipping in my case...
customer_reviews.text: My 7.2 cf model freezer arrived in half the time as the repair parts for my refrigerator! This freezer is quiet, and gets cold very quickly. Allow the unit to sit for 6 hours, as per instructions. If the unit is shipped in a non-upright position, the oil and refrigerant need time to redistribute to prevent compressor slugging or dry running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good byuy.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, and reliable. Fast shipping and well packed. A good byuy.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Cole

customer_reviews.title: Damage at factory.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, super quiet and is working well at this time. One corner was damaged ( before it was packaged) and I had to extend the leg on that side to the fullest and screw the other side in as far as it would go.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Walmsley

customer_reviews.title: Bulk meal delivery storage- avoid freezer burn!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to keep meal deliveries from frostbite that occurs in regular upright fridge freeze combo due to food avalanches. Why pay for quality food then eat with frostbite freezer burn? Easy setup. No issues. Grab what you want and top closes perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Good size, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Got it delivered, put it in place, easy to level. I did not turn it on for about 8 or so hours after delivery to let the refrigerant settle. The instructions say wait six hours. Plugged it in. It works. It's a very useful size. Not gigantic, but certainly can hold quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jon V. Nadelberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and fast Ship!
customer_reviews.text: I always shop around for products that I want to buy, and Amazon once again gave the best price. Not only was this a great deal, but it is perfect size for my family. We always have overflow in our refridgerator freezer, and this was perfect size freezer to store our steak, hamburger, chicken and bulk items in. Thanks for good price and quickly shipping it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Felker

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome freezer, was down to -3° in less than 24 hours. Smaller than I expected when it arrived, but still perfect for what I needed it for. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew E. Reichert

customer_reviews.title: works great.  Have 2 of these
customer_reviews.text: These freezers work great. That is why we got a second one for our second home. We use them for extra frozen meats and vegetables, etc. Less trips to the store and can get items when they are on sale.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shack

customer_reviews.title: Lower price; great value
customer_reviews.text: I almost purchased this from Costco and paid more. Thanks for the lower price. The size fits the need to occupy a smaller space, freeing up space in our fridge-freezer. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Bluebonnet

customer_reviews.title: poorly built
customer_reviews.text: After less than 2 years of use, a leak in the coolant system at a connection (POOR SOLDER JOINT) caused loss of coolant and has rendered unit useless. Factory service rep stated it would cost less to by a new one. Well in less than two months the price has doubled even if you can find one
customer_reviews.author: rocster0289

customer_reviews.title: Love this large capacity work horse!
customer_reviews.text: Great functional chest freezer. Purchased a year ago and it going strong. Have used it to store ice and food items for large family items. Great to have when favorite freezable foods go on sale.
customer_reviews.author: nyitaly

customer_reviews.title: It get iced!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really regret to buy it because I didn't know this kind of freezer get iced so I have to clean every month...
customer_reviews.author: Seong Bum Woo

customer_reviews.title: Smelly Not Sure Why
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why, but although the freezer keeps things very frozen - frozen solid in fact - everything in it smells. I'm not sure if it freezes and then unfreezes or if something is malfunctioning in the freezer but it is really really stinky. And the food has only been in there for a month perhaps. Should last much longer in a freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Barlean

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around for awhile before choosing this one. You can get cheaper or more expensive ones. I really like it and you can store a lot of things in here. The storage rack is great for little things but I wish there were more. The reason I took a star off is because there is no internal light. Not a deal breaker but slightly annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE FREEZER
customer_reviews.text: I have had this little freezer nearly 3 years with perfect operation. Never had any problems at all. Perfect size for a small place. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this 2 1/2 months ago and works great. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: SteveB

customer_reviews.title: Great freezer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this freezer! It is fantastic, I have had it for a few months and it's completely stocked and works wonderfully! I have no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dented
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but came dented . Packaging leaves A lot to be desired . This is a review for the upright mini freezer. NOT THE CHEST FREEZER.
customer_reviews.author: Ninadetusojos

customer_reviews.title: Stays at a nice constant temp
customer_reviews.text: Working very well so far. Stocked it full with last season's venison. Stays at a nice constant temp. No defrost required so far.
customer_reviews.author: Silverback

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this freezer
customer_reviews.text: It came very well packed, was easy to set up, is lighter than expected, is so quiet you can't tell that it is running, has minimal exhaust, so far maintains temp very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FREEZER
customer_reviews.text: This freezer from Danby is certainly one of the best small freezers we have had. It is very quiet and performs its intended job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and soooo much better than a chest type. It’s expensive but well made.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fleck

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Upset. We had a small wedding and this was the only gift I wanted. We got it. About nine months later it quit working. Lost all our food and our wedding cake we saved for our anniversary. Insanely upset. Huge regret.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great. Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Used it to build a beer keezer. Worked out great. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: bpktwo

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator works great almost two years after buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazona

customer_reviews.title: Great little freezer
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS MAT! I wasn't to sure about this brand. but I love this little freezer. reminds me of the old fashion soda coolers. I've had no problem at all with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Heinle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good freezer that works as expected, not very large but does the job for small family.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Bummer.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I have purchased for our company...the first one is still running strong but this one just FAILED. It is completely on the blink. I will try out reach out to the company but don't know how? Naturally we are out of the 30 day return but this product failed at the 5 month mark. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Terry McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Great freezer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice freezer. Runs quietly and is just right size for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Sue N.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Moved it with me to the apartment. Wouldn't live without it!
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come damaged like a lot of reviews said looks nice works grest ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come damaged like a lot of reviews said looks nice works grest sometimes gets altitle loud but not louder than the fridge so oh well lol
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Buy one of those baby-proofing latches to go with it
customer_reviews.text: Door does not seal well. In the 2.5 years we’ve owned this freezer, the door has failed to seal 4-5 times, resulting in varying levels of food loss depending on how fast I noticed. Due to the poor seal, it iced over very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Veade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deep freezer. Hasn't collected frost in four months, keeps everything really cold. Has useful baskets for organization
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great freezer. we move it lots and the built in wheels make the job much easier.
customer_reviews.author: danielnapa

customer_reviews.title: Great freezer. It had some body damage without any ...
customer_reviews.text: Great freezer. It had some body damage without any damage to the box, so it made me think that I might be receiving a returned unit or a known damaged unit. I'm too lazy to return things because of cosmetic damage, so I didn't say anything. It has worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Beaverton

customer_reviews.title: Danny freezer
customer_reviews.text: Owned it for a year now and it is reliable and quiet. Good freezer at a reasonable price, perfect for small spaces, if you need a small freezer this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Handyandy

customer_reviews.title: Dany 3.8 CU chest Freezer
customer_reviews.text: arrived damaged very disappointed had two dents and freezer did not work although this product has a four star ratting not sure if I want to re order same brand have to start all over again
customer_reviews.author: renee barlow

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: As described. I've had this for about 4 months out in my garage. It's doing ok even with 20 straight days of over 90 degree heat. Sometimes it does seal itself closed if I had it open and then go to reopen it, but the size is good and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised, and works as represented. I bought a freezer thermometer with it, which I think is a good idea. It's allowed me to adjust the temperature just so, and the freezer stays steady at that temperature.
customer_reviews.author: W. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great small freezer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice freezer for the price and size. Perfect for our family. Easy to maneuver and doesn’t take much space.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Middle setting cools to zero degrees F. Great size for an auxiliary freezer. Shipping packaging was really good, the freezer arrived in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, perfect size, no shipping damage
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, the freezer was quiet and seems of perfect size for me. Packaging was good and the item was not damaged in any way when I received it. It was a pleasure that the item was delivered right to my front door.
customer_reviews.author: KKT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I would do without this freezer
customer_reviews.author: Red Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Freezer exterior with wrinkled metal
customer_reviews.text: Shipping box of freezer had no visible damage so we accepted the package. Upon opening and unpacking freezer there are two wrinkles in the metal on both front corners. The freezer seems to work at this time. Seems like a huge hassle to try and return it. Because the shipping box is not marred you have to think it was damaged before it was packed for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: K Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn nice little freezer it has 2 baskets in ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty darn nice little freezer it has 2 baskets in it and it just doesn't seem to be as deep as other freezers I can reach pretty much all of it with ease. I'm glad I found this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little freezer
customer_reviews.text: Great little freezer! Helped me organize my refrigerator freezer so now I can see what I have! Works well in a hot garage. I got 2 plastic stacking baskets from Bed Bath and Beyond so I can lift things out and look underneath them...very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Greenvillebaker

customer_reviews.title: Great value and it is doing a great job!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Just what we were looking for and maximizes our laundry room space.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado13

product_meta.title: Danby DCF072A2WDB-3 DCF072A2WDB1 Chest Freezer, 7.2 Cubic Feet, White
product_meta.description:
Size:7.2 cu.ft.| Color:WhiteFROM THE MANUFACTURER
This dependable chest freezer by Danby is the perfect addition to any type of household or cottage. Your electricity bills will be noticeably reduced due to the efficient and smart foam-insulated cabinet and rounded lid. The freezer is cooled by environmentally friendly R600a refrigerant. The easy-to-access front-mount mechanical thermostat allows you to easily and quickly program the unit to the desired temperature. There’s more than enough storage room in this elegant appliance as this spacious unit offers 7.2 cubic feet of space without taking up too much room. This popular model comes with a convenient manual-defrost system and drain along with a strong vinyl-coated basket to separate and store your most popular foods. The interior liner is designed for easy cleaning and the freezer comes with a worry-free 12 month warranty on parts and labor along with convenient in-home service.
feature_bullets: Energy efficient foam insulated cabinet and lid
